plot: Using found footage, we're introduced to the short life of Bunker Spreckels, Clark Gable's stepson and surfing legend.
title: My Surfing Lucifer
plot_es: Using found footage, we're introduced to the short life of Bunker Spreckels, Clark Gable's stepson and surfing legend.
plot_en: Using found footage, we're introduced to the short life of Bunker Spreckels, Clark Gable's stepson and surfing legend.
